comments.body: Would add that it would be useful if we tested some compiling some simple CofeeScript code. Have raised as feedstock issue ( https://github.com/conda-forge/coffeescript-feedstock/issues/1 ).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +22,26 @@test:
  commands:
    - npm list -g coffeescript
  requires:
    - nodejs
